title: California is diverging from the CDC on masks in schools
content:
1. California is diverging from the CDC on masks in schools  SFGate
  2. CDC: Vaccinated teachers and students don't need masks inside school buildings  WPTZ
  3. California to require masks at schools, though CDC says they're not needed if vaccinated  Yahoo News
  4. Opinion | The CDC's latest school guidelines are not perfect, but they're better than expected  The Washington Post
  5. Phewwww, the CDC is mostly on target in rules for opening school this fall  USA TODAY
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
